headline: Why Deckers Outdoor (DECK) Is Up 5.0% After Stifel Upgrade on Hoka and Ugg Brand Momentum
summary: In late November 2025, Stifel upgraded Deckers Outdoor to Buy from Hold following investor meetings, citing the company’s strong confidence in the growth prospects of its Hoka brand and ongoing demand for Ugg. This upgrade was driven by positive feedback on core brand performance internationally, but also highlighted continued tariff headwinds and pressures facing the US consumer market. We will assess how renewed management optimism for Hoka’s expansion could influence Deckers Outdoor’s...
